hymn.title: Lord, when the Father ne'er was known

layout.singingstanza: Lord, when the Fath -- er ne'er was known, The Fath -- er came through Thee be -- low, That we who lived in ig -- no -- rance Might through Thy -- self the Fath -- er know.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, when the Father ne'er was known, The Father came through Thee below, That we who lived in ignorance Might through Thyself the Father know.
Now as the Spirit Thou hast come E'en as the Father came in Thee; As we through Thee the Father know, Now through the Spirit we know Thee.
Thou, Lord, the Father once wast called, But now the Holy Spirit art; The Spirit is Thine other form, Thyself to dwell within our heart.
By knowing Thee as Spirit, Lord, We realize Thy life's outflow, Thy glory and Thy character, And all Thy being's wonders know.
